Commissioner Marco “Markie” Villegas2024-01-30T16:21:14+00:00

Marco “Markie” Villegas

“San Juan is here for you. It’s only getting better for our community!”

I want you to know that our city stands as a steadfast supporter of each and every one of you. San Juan is not just a place on the map; it’s a promise of progress and unity. Rest assured, the path ahead is one of continuous improvement, dedicated to enhancing the lives of our vibrant community. As we move forward together, remember that our commitment to your well-being is unwavering, and our city is only on an upward trajectory. With each passing day, we’re working tirelessly to ensure that San Juan becomes an even better place for you and your loved ones.
